text: Michael Sze Cho-cheung, GBS, CBE, ISO, JP (; 23 June 1945 – 19 May 2022) was a Hong Kong politician. Sze was the Secretary for Constitutional Affairs from 1991 to 1994 and Secretary for the Civil Service from 1994 to 1996. He was Executive Director of the Trade Development Council (DTC) from 1996 to 2004 and chairman of the Operations Review Committee of the Independent Commission Against Corruption (ICAC) until 2014. Sze died on 19 May 2022 in Hong Kong, aged 76.前宪制事务司施祖祥清晨离世 终年76岁 ==References== Category:1945 births Category:2022 deaths Category:Hong Kong politicians
title: Michael Sze
